data.title: Why don't country flags use the color purple?
data.meta_description: There are 196 countries in the world today and virtually none of them have purple on their national flag. So what’s wrong with purple? After Skool explains how the color was worth more than gold.
data.text:

Why don't country flags use the color purple?

10,323,851 Views

Best of Web

Let’s Begin…

There are 196 countries in the world today and virtually none of them have purple on their national flag. So what’s wrong with purple? After Skool explains how the color was worth more than gold.
